item.title: Developing UI Component in Blazor MAUI
item.description:
Join us live as we dive into cross-platform component development using Blazor with .NET MAUI ‚Äî the future of native app development powered by web tech!
In this session, we‚Äôll: Break down how to architect reusable UI components for mobile and desktop Explore native capabilities through MAUI‚Äôs platform APIs in a Blazor context Show how to share logic and design across Android, iOS, Windows, and macOS Live-code real-world components and integrate them into a working app Whether you're a .NET developer, mobile enthusiast, or architect looking to unify your stack, this stream will give you practical insights into building flexible and scalable Blazor MAUI components.
üîß Bring your questions. üîÅ Share your thoughts. Let‚Äôs build the future of cross-platform .NET ‚Äî together.
#Blazor #MAUI #DotNet #CrossPlatform #ARKLive #DevStream

item.title: The Hidden Cost of Being the Team Hero - Dev Leader Weekly 96
item.description: Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss the trap of becoming a hero on the team and what you can do about it!

item.title: The Hidden Cost of Being the Team Hero - Engineering Manager AMA
item.description:
You want to help. It feels good to take action, drive for results, and be recognized for it. You're trying to do the right thing.
But it's not scaling. In fact, you've now become the bottleneck.
You're the team hero.
As with all livestreams, I'm looking forward to answering YOUR questions! So join me live and ask in the chat, or you can comment now and I can try to get it answered while I stream.
